Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.controllers

Class WelcomeController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.controllers.FXMLController
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.controllers.WelcomeController
public class WelcomeController extends FXMLController
WelcomeController handles the starting scene of the gui, the main menu and the game creation form

  • Method Details

    • isShowingMainMenu

      public boolean isShowingMainMenu()
      Returns true if the controller is showing the main menu, otherwise false
      Returns:
      true if the controller is showing the main menu, otherwise false

    • onSubmit

      void onSubmit(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Responds to the submit button present in the starting scene. The method will control that every text field (for the username, the server ip and the server port) is correctly compiled, if so notifies the gui class otherwise it displays an alert. If the server port and ip are already processed but the nickname no (for example if the nickname was duplicated on the server and so the user have to choose another one), the method will control only the nickname text field
      Parameters:
      event - the action event fired after the submit button press

    • getOnlyNickname

      private void getOnlyNickname()
      Controls the nickname present on the nickname text field, if a nickname is present it fires an event to the gui

    • addGUI

      public void addGUI(GUI gui)
      Associate the specified gui instance to this controller
      Parameters:
      gui - the instance of the gui

    • onError

      public void onError(ErrorMessageType error, String errorInfo)
      Display an alert that contains a different message in base of the specified error and error info
      Specified by:
      onError in class FXMLController
      Parameters:
      error - the type of error
      errorInfo - the description of the error

    • showMainMenu

      public void showMainMenu(String nickname)
      Shows the main menu of the game, where the user can choose if he wants to create a new game, or to search a game in the global lobby or to quit the application
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the user, used to print a personal message

    • showNewGameForm

      private void showNewGameForm(String nickname)
      Shows the form for creating a new game. The form contains the number of players choice box, where the user can select the number of players of the game, and the rules choice box, where the user can select the type of rules. A button to return to the main menu is also present.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the user, used to print a personal message

    • getContainerVbox

      private javafx.scene.layout.VBox getContainerVbox()
      Returns a newly created VBox used as the container for the main menu or for the create game form
      Returns:
      a newly created VBox used as the container for the main menu or for the create game form

    • getTitleText

      private javafx.scene.text.Text getTitleText(String textString, double width)
      Returns a Text that have the specified string and the specified wrapping width. The text will have a center text alignment.
      Parameters:
      textString - the content of the text
      width - the wrapping width of the text
      Returns:
      a Text that have the specified string and the specified wrapping width

    • getContainerHBoxForCreateGame

      private javafx.scene.layout.HBox getContainerHBoxForCreateGame(double width)
      Returns the container HBox for all items of the create game form. The hBox will wrap the number of players choice box and label or the rules choice box and label or the bottom bar with the buttons
      Parameters:
      width - the width of the hBox
      Returns:
      the container HBox for all items of the create game form
